newsitem.title: USA: Sioux Falls cattle up $0.50-1.00 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Sioux Falls cattle up $0.50-1.00 - USDA.

text.p: USDA said Slaughter steers and heifers were fairly active. Both classes traded $0.50 higher, instances $1.00 higher. Demand was good.

Steers - high select and choice 2-3 1250-1400 lbs 62.50-63.50, half load choice 2-3 limousin cross 1264 lbs certified drug-free 65.25. Select and choice 2-3 1100-1300 lbs 60.00-62.50. Select 1-2 57.00-60.00.

Heifers - high select and choice 2-3 1050-1200 lbs 62.00-63.00, half load choice 2-3 limousin cross 1126 lbs certified drug-free 65.25. Select and choice 2-3 1000-1125 lbs 59.00-62.00. Select 1-2 57.00-59.00.
